actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on subassemblies for instruments or apparatus for measuring or checking electrical quantities.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on subassemblies for instruments or apparatus for measuring or checking electrical quantities.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on subassemblies for instruments or apparatus for measuring or checking electrical quantities.
